abstract.t: The IPv4 main header contained a 16-bit IPID for fragmentation andreassembly. This field was commonly used by network diagnosticians fortracking packets on multi-tier networks. In IPv6, the IPID has beenmoved to the Fragment header. A new Diagnostic header for IPv6 whichcan be sent with every packet as a part of the Destination Optionsheader with a 64-bit IPID is defined in this document.
